plot: High-school student Sam Witwicky buys his first car
column3: who is actually the Autobot Bumblebee. Bumblebee defends Sam and his girlfriend Mikaela Banes from the Decepticon Barricade
column4: before the other Autobots arrive on Earth. They are searching for the Allspark
column5: and the war on Earth heats up as the Decepticons attack a United States military base in Qatar. Sam and Mikaela are taken by the top-secret agency Sector 7 to help stop the Decepticons
column6: but when they learn the agency also intends to destroy the Autobots
column7: they formulate their own plan to save the world.
